prompts: Draw the nearest receipt’s folds and torn edge.
Sketch the current dent in your pillow.
Draw the shadow under your mug handle.
Sketch how your headphone cable lies right now.
Draw the latest water ring on your desk.
Sketch the nearest sleeve cuff wrinkle.
Draw the object touching your left foot.
Sketch crumbs from your most recent bite.
Draw the nearest zipper teeth in close-up.
Sketch fingerprint smudges on your phone screen.
Draw your energy as bars in a tiny battery.
Sketch your focus as a spotlight on one object.
Draw your stress as one rock in a backpack.
Sketch your mood as weather inside a small jar.
Draw your patience as sand in an hourglass.
Sketch your inbox as envelopes spilling out.
Draw your to-do load as sticky notes on a wall.
Sketch your momentum as a cart on a hill.
Draw the nearest plant leaf curl right now.
Sketch the current knot in a bag handle.
Draw the nearest sock fold or seam.
Sketch the reflection in your spoon right now.
Draw the nearest cracked corner of paper.
Sketch the angle of your laptop screen right now.
Draw what sits closest to your right elbow.
Sketch two shadows meeting in your nearest corner.
Draw the latest pen mark on your hand.
Sketch the nearest charging brick and cable.
Draw today’s leftover foam in your drink.
Sketch the object nearest your knee without moving it.
